result.execSummary:
The defendant Cameron J Fleming was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Cameron J Fleming is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Cameron J Fleming was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant may petition the court for expungement, in writing, after 12 months if the DE does not violate any state or federal laws & all fines/costs/surcharges have been paid.

Acknowledgment of Plea Offer/Agreement

Attorney Jason Zapf appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Hans Koesser.  Clerk: MHerr.
MINUTES:  11:27am-  Matter is resolved.  Defendant entered a plea of guilty to count 1; found guilty by the court.  On the motion of the State, count 2 is dismissed.  Court orders a $200.00 fine plus costs & drug surcharge, due in 30 days or civil judgment.  NO DNA SURCHARGE.  Appeal rights given.  Defendant may petition the court for expungement, in writing, after 12 months if the DE does not violate any state or federal laws & all fines/costs/surcharges have been paid.
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 25, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Atty Koesser in a jury trial in another court today.  Plea & sentencing to be rescheduled.
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 28, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
Attorney Koesser is requesting 6/25/2015 Final pre-trial be rescheduled at the request of the DE.  Matter is resolved.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 4/28/2015 at 2:30pm.  NTBS by the Court.
Final pre-trial on June 25, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Due to ongoing jury trial (State v. White & State v. White), 3/19/2015 Final pre-trial is rescheduled to 6/25/2015 at 9am.  NTBS by the Court.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.
